name: Whirlwind
overview: Whirlwind rescued from oblivion. It is the game Whirlwind, announced for sale in 1984 by the Blaby Computer Games company, which until now has remained missing, including its cover. We will move left and right and to go down we will use some areas of soil that is disintegrating. This will force us to calculate very well our movements and strategy to catch the umbrellas and especially to avoid the deadly laser.
